summary: An Ordinance providing for the laying off, widening, extending, altering and establishing of Florentia Street and West Florentia Street, from First Avenue North to First Avenue West; in the City of Seattle; and providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor; and providing that the payment for such improvement be made by special assessment upon property specially benefited, in the manner provided by law.
